file_content.text: I should have taken the gig on Hoth....
The rakghouls are dead.
And the other things? The big ones? What were they?
You know what, long as they're dead, I don't give a bantha's backside.
Let the Jedi figure it out.
I don't need company. I need someone to kill those super-rakghouls.
M--Master Jedi! But how... there were no survivors! You... weren't part of the research team, were you?
Then I gotta warn you, there's something around here that hunts Jedi. Like the mother of all rakghouls.
The creatures got a whole Jedi expedition. Then ate my unit for dessert.
Take a friendly warning? There's worse critters on this planet than rakghouls.
Now I ain't no coward; I've hunted Sand Demons on Tatooine, fought Sith during the war on Coruscant. Clearing the wildlife on Taris seemed like an easy gig.
But these creatures ate a whole team of Jedi for lunch! What are we supposed to do except be dessert?
Who are you? Why are you telling me this?
Do I know you?
Kord Murdok. Used to lead the Blaster Brothers mercenary company. Now I'm the only one left.
What creatures? Something attacked the Jedi?
Explain all that?
Something that makes rakghouls look downright cute and cuddly.
Take it easy.
You watch a dozen men in heavy armor get eaten like candy and see how calm you are!
Should've known when they said the Jedi got wiped out. What am I supposed to do that half a dozen Jedi can't?
I don't know if those monsters ate the Jedi and barfed up the Force, but they were using powers like I've never seen.
We cannot ignore a menace on that scale.
I'll investigate.
You think you can do better than the other Jedi? Be my guest.
I'll make sure these creatures spread no further.
I can handle it.
Ain't you just the noble one....
If I get it done where you failed, can I collect the credits?
You want to share your fee?
Any credits I have are for blood payments to the men's families. But there's plenty the Jedi left behind, if you follow.
Sounds like a challenge.
Goody for you.
You go after those monsters, just be careful. They're smart, people-smart.
And let me know what happens. So I can convince them not to send me back in....
Don't slow down now. I'm sure not going after them.
Keep running. [Refuse quest]
You're smarter than you look.
I've never seen anything like that....
